text: Not that we didn't have close relationships with our parents - I'm very close to my mom - but parents didn't think anything of going off for a few weeks and leaving their kids.
author: Candice Bergen

text: Mom and Dad would stay in bed on Sunday morning, but the kids would have to go to church.
author: Lynn Johnston

text: Deep down, my mom had long suspected I was gay... Much of her anger and hurt came from her sense of betrayal that she was the last to be told.
author: Chaz Bono

text: What mom cares about most is that I'm happy, healthy and enjoying my life.
author: Chaz Bono

text: My daily schedule is quite hectic, but I have to put my health first in order to be the best mom and wife I can be.
author: Ellen Pompeo
